location.name: Amphitheater
location.text:
Teacher : Blah blah blah... project... 
 Your eyes are fluttering. Fatigue inavdes you. Slowly, the room around you disappears. You must recognize that Jovo's classes have never been your strength....as evidenced by your grades in the last test. You feel your eyelids become heavier and heavier 
 - BAM ! 
 You make up with a start ! Around you, the students have already started to leave the amphitheater. It was their noisy discussionsthat got you out of sleep. Very quickly, you are the only one still sitting. The teacher glares at you from his desk. He propably wants to go on a lunch break or maybe he noticed that you slept the entire lecture... You look away. 
 On your right, you notice a young long-haired girl who are smiling at you. On your left, there is a bearded boy hypnotised by his phone. The exit of the amphitheater are calling you : it's the freedom's door. You finally decide to get up.
location.desc: It is a place where the students assist to their lecture. It is also a cold place without any warmth.

location.name: Hall
location.text: You are in the main place of the game : the hall of the building
location.desc: It is a place where the students wait for their classes. They also can drink coffee at the coffee machine.

location.name: Classroom
location.text: You enter in the classroom. Maria, as the perfect student, is sitting in the first row. She is ready for the beginning of the class. Hurry up it will starts in few minutes.
location.desc: In the classroom, the students can assist to classes and learn new things.

location.name: Secretary's office
location.text: You are in the secretary's office. Talk with the secretary if you need anything.
location.desc: If you need informations or health's points, you can come here. The secretary will be happy to help you if you ask her politely of course...

location.name: Smoker Zone
location.text: You are in the smoker zone. Be careful at your lungs !
location.desc: The students who smoke come here. At every break, this place is full of toxic smoke...

location.name: Secret Room
location.text: You are in the secret room. Good luck leaving this scary place... \n The only way to exit it is to use the precious key. If you do not have it then your life won't be long...
location.desc: It is a secret place somewhere...

item.name: The Key
item.desc: This is the only key to escape from the room.

dialog-node.text: The closer you get to him, the more nasty his look becomes...It's a bad idea. You turn around.
Teacher : What about your papers, young man ! You have to listen in lecture.

You go down the amphitheater and take the document on the teacher's desk. It describes exactly the differents steps of the project : you are learning that you must find a partner. You immediately start to find one. \n The teacher leaves the amphitheater by grumbling something about the students these days... \n You have one sheet in your possession and you need 4 to complete the project.

Teacher : blah blah blah.... \n Now I will /* ramasser */ your project. Put them on my desk. \n You stand up and take the project in your hands. You read it briefly while you go down the stairs. Your hands start to shake. You are not sure about this project... You look around, your partner Maki is not here so you can not ask him his opinion. What can you do ?
You give your project to the teacher. You really hope to have a good mark because you work so hard on it. After leaving your project on his desk, you leave the amphitheater with finger crossed.

You decide to keep it. After all, the teacher won't be mad if you give it to him tomorrow... This day /* supplémentaire*/ will let you /* perfectionner */ your project \n Teacher : I forgot to tell you, if you do not give me your project today then you will get a 0. \n Maybe you will re-think about give it now or not...
You decide to assist to the class. It will denefits you. You are sure of that. \n Except Maria sitting in the first row, the other chairs are empty. \n Where do you want to sit ?

You chose to sit in the first row, this is a good choice. It will allow you to get every information the teacher will give. The chair next to Maria is empty... 
 You : Hey Maria ! Can I sit next to you ? 
 Maria : Of course you can ! It has been so long since our last conversation... 
 - Yeah I know... By the way, I wanted to apologize to you for changing my project's partner... 
 - Do not be worried about this, I am not mad at you or at least not anymore... Besides, I found a project's partner so I am not alone... 
 Maria smiles at you. You are truly relieve that Maria do not *t'en vouloir* anymore. 
 Now you can completely focus on the lesson... 
 
 Teacher : The class will starts in a few minutes. For the students who do not want to be there then I will ask you to leave the classroom and for the others then I will ask you to stop the chatting...
dialog-node.answer: Stay focus on the entire class

dialog-node.text:
You chose to sit in the middle row, maybe this is not the best choice but you did not want to sit in the first row... The teacher would have been to close to you... 
 You are not worried, you will still be focus on the class... for sure ... for 80 per cents sure... 
 Teacher : The class will starts in a few minutes. For the students who do not want to be there then I will ask you to leave the classroom and for the others then I will ask you to stop the chatting...
dialog-node.answer: Stay focus on the entire class

dialog-node.text: You chose to sit in the last row. Behind others, the teacher will not see you and you will be able to do everything except listen to him... \n Teacher : The class will starts in a few minutes. For the students who do not want to be there then I will ask you to leave the classroom and for the others then I will ask you to stop the chatting... \n
dialog-node.answer: Try to stay focus on the class

dialog-node.text: You succeeded to stay focus on the class. Every information given by the teacher were caught by your brain. You are pride of yourself and you were right to assist to it because it was very benefit for you. \n Teacher : The class is finished but before exit, I give you a paper useful for your project. \n You received another page to complete your project. Assisted to the class was definitely a good thing for you !

The class is finally finished... You tried to stay focus but you have to admit that your sight was more outside throught the window than focus on the black board in front of you. You caught some information about a paper given by the teacher but when you realized the class was over, the teacher was already gone. Let's hope you won't regret it later...

character.name: Maria
character.desc: She is a beautiful long-haired girl and you are lucky, she is in the same class than you.

dialog-node.text: Long-haired girl : Hello ! My name is Maria. I saw that you were sleeping during class. You should go to see the teacher for the explanations that you missed.
Maria : Do you have a pair for the project ? Otherwise we could get together if you want.

Maria smiles at you and you have the impression that the entire universe is contained in her dimples.
 She takes your hand. 
 Maria : I am really happy that you want to work with me ! 
 It is your turn to blush. Embarrased, you tell her that you are happy too. Maria smiles at you again. You decide to leave the amphitheater together and come back home. You live next to each other, so why not make the way together ?... 
 Suddenly, a young man approch you with a nice smile on his face. 
 Young man : Hey classmate. I was wondering, do you have a partner for the project ?.... Because if you do not have one then we can be together... 
 After his long and non-sense speech, your head is turning.
You are alone and you read the project again... You absolutely need a partner.
What !? You do not want to be with me... Why ?...
dialog-node.answer: I do not want to be with you
I was joking. Let's do the project together

dialog-node.text: Come on, it will be fun. Are you really sure you do not want to be with me ?
You accept Maki's proposition. Maki hugs you and tells you see you tomorrow. Here is someone who will make a reliable partner. Happy with yourself, you go home whistling.

character.name: Zack
character.desc: He is a bearded man in the same class than you.

dialog-node.text: Bearded man : Hi ! I am Zack. How was your nap ?
Do you want to be my partner for the project ?

You accept his proposition. He seems to be happy. Immediately, he goes to join his friends and disappears from your sight. You try to follow him but he was faster than you and you lost him. You will propably never see him again and accept his proposition was a terrible mistake. 
 Suddenly, a young man approch you with a nice smile on his face. 
 Young man : You should not have accepted his proposition ! He won't do anything on the project and you are going to do everything by yourself. Come with me. Besides, I already did a similar project so it is going to be so easy. 
 - Oh... I am Maki by the way.
You are alone and you read the project again... You absolutely need a partner.

You accept Maki's proposition and you are so happy to be free from Zack. Maki hugs you and tells you see you tomorrow. Here is someone who will make a reliable partner. Happy with yourself, you go home whistling.
You are seeing Zack in the smoker zone. You come closer to him with the hope that maybe he knows where are the missing pages. \n Zack : I have nothing to tell you...

You go out the amphitheater and you arrive in the hall of the building. A lots of students are chatting. You will find a partner here. As soon as this thought comes in your mind, a young man who seems to be a little bit too excited approch you : \n Young man : Hey classmate. I was wondering, do you have a partner for the project ?.... Because if you do not have one then we can be together. \n After his long and non-sense speech, your head is turning. You do not know if it is due to the smoke of his electronic cigarette or due to the lots of information he gave you. You finally understand that he want to be your project partner.

You accept Maki's proposition with a confused mind. After this, he leaves the building. You decide to go home to take a rest. After all, your mission to find a partner was a success so you can have a little break.

Maki is in the smoker zone as always, you come closer to him. 
 Maki : What's up dude ? 
 You : Good
dialog-node.answer: Did you work on the project ?

dialog-node.text: Maki : Okay see you later then
Maki : Yeah do not be worried about this. \n You : I'm serious... Maki : I did not start yet but trust me I will work on it soon.
Maki : You should go to see the secretary, I heard that she might have a paper to complete our project...

La date pour rendre le projet arrive à grand pas. Unfortunately, you have to get back the paper owned by Maki. You gather your strength because /* affronter */ Maki will be difficult. 
 You : I am here to get back your paper... 
 Maki : What paper ? 
 - The page you were supposed to do... you know for the project 
 - I see... 
 - .... 
 - I am joking, of course I have it. Did you doubt about it ?
Maki : Seriously ?! I told you to trust me... so trust me... \n - Remind me why are you here ? \n You sigh... How is it possible to have a memory so short...
dialog-node.answer: I am here for the project's page

dialog-node.text: Maki : You are the best partner ! Of course you were right to trust me. \n So now, do you want me to give you my project's page ?
dialog-node.answer: No I do not want it

dialog-node.text: Mika finally give you his work. You read what he done and you are *kinda* impressed by it. You are happy by the fact that Maki was your project's partner because his work was great.

character.name: Secretary
character.desc: She helps when she can the students...

dialog-node.text: You are going to enter in the secretary's office. What do you want to do ?
dialog-node.answer: Knock at the door before entering

dialog-node.text: Hello. How are you ?
It is the perfect day to be happy. \n So tell me what can I do for you ?
dialog-node.answer: I just wanted to talk with you

dialog-node.text: Do not be worried, it will be better tomorrow. \n So tell me what can I do for you ?
dialog-node.answer: I just wanted to talk with you

dialog-node.text: Oh ! That's nice. You can come back whenever you need.
dialog-node.answer: No, you won't see me again

dialog-node.text: I have several items in my possession. What do you need ?
Secretary : As you ask politely, I give you these health's points. You will need them. \n You receive 40 health's points.
Secretary : Oh I see. Why do you think I have a sheet for the project ?
dialog-node.answer: It was written on a paper

dialog-node.text: Secretary : Well, I do not know if I will give it to you... You need to assist to the class first and then I will give it to you.
Secretary : What is these manners young man ! \n Do you really think that's a good behaviour ? I do not think so...
You apologize for your disrespectful behaviour. The secretary seems to relax a little bit. \n Secretary : Hmm... tell me why are you here and maybe I will help you ...
dialog-node.answer: I just wanted to talk to you

dialog-node.text: You do not want to apologize yourself. The secretary grins, she seems angrier than before. You think she won't help you for anything and maybe you are right... \n Secretary : First you come without knocking at the door and now you refuse to apologize for this. I won't give you what you want, come later !

Maki, your project's partner talked about a mystery key. You are now looking at it. A rumor says that the key is in the secretary's office. You knock at her door. The door slowly opens but everything is dark inside. She is not inside... \n What do you want to do ?
You are frightening to enter in her office without her consent. If Maki were you, he would probably enter but you are too pure for this. You will come back later... when she will be available.

You absolutely want this key and you know that it is in this room. So you have no choice. You quietly enter in the room and close the door behind you. The key could be everywhere and you do not know where to start.

You start with the desk but there is a lot of paper on it. It is really messy. You check every desk's *tiroirs*. Nothing... Suddenly, a shiny object take your sight. You bend over to have a better look and then with glistering eyes, you take delicately the key. * get the key *

You start with the drawer. It contains thousand of books. Unfortunately your reseach seems unexisted... The only potential good things that you get was some private informations on your teachers... Maybe you could use them to get a bonus points on your project...

The desk is no messy that you do not know where to start... There is no key amount the paper. You check every desk's *tiroirs*. Nothing... Suddenly, a shiny object take your sight. You bend over to have a better look and then with glistering eyes, you delicately take the key. * get the key *

From upstairs, you have a good view on the amphitheater. You notice a girl sitting in the first row. You never saw this girl but you are a good person and you do want her to feel alone. You wonder why and decide to approach her. 
 You : Hey are you okay ?... 
 Unknown girl : Leave me alone, I do not need you ! I just want to be alone !
